hero.title: Avenqor: focused education for high-risk markets.
hero.subtitle: Avenqor exists for traders who want structure, not hype. We work on Forex, Crypto and Binary options education for people in the EU, UK and UAE who take risk seriously and prefer clear language over promises.

sideCard.title: What Avenqor is – and what it is not
sideCard.subtitle: Short overview before you go deeper.

whatWeAre.label: What we are
items: Structured PDF courses by level and market.
Custom courses shaped around your inputs.

whatWeAreNot.label: What we are not
items: Not a broker or prop firm.
Not a signal, copy-trading or PAMM/MAM service.
Not an investment advisor or fund manager.
We do not promise profits or performance.

whoIsFor.title: Who Avenqor is actually built for.
whoIsFor.subtitle: Three main profiles – all with the same requirement: willingness to treat risk seriously and avoid get-rich-quick expectations.

profiles.title: New to high-risk markets
profiles.description: You have heard about Forex, Crypto or Binary options but want a structured base before committing real money. You prefer to see risk clearly instead of chasing extreme screenshots.

profiles.title: Already trading, results unstable
profiles.description: You have experience, maybe even good phases – but also deep drawdowns and emotional over-trading. You want to rebuild the foundation: risk, process and expectations.

profiles.title: Systems-first learners
profiles.description: You like clear frameworks, checklists and journaling. You are not looking for someone to tell you what to click – you want a system to analyse, adapt and make your own.

howWeBuild.title: How Avenqor courses and AI outputs are structured.
howWeBuild.subtitle: Whether you choose a ready-made course, a custom PDF or an AI strategy, the idea is the same: structured, modular content you can revisit.

items.title: PDF courses by market & level
items.description: Courses are split into modules, key concepts, structured examples and checklists. You can print them or keep them in a PDF reader while looking at charts.

items.title: Custom courses tailored to your inputs
items.description: When you request a custom course, we use your experience, deposit size, risk tolerance and goals as inputs to structure a PDF that matches your situation.

items.title: AI strategies as structured examples
items.description: AI strategies produce a plan with setup criteria, entry/exit logic and a risk checklist. They are not trade signals – they are examples of how a plan might look when written clearly.

regions.title: Regions, currencies and languages.
regions.subtitle: Avenqor is designed with specific regions and languages in mind. This helps keep examples and structures more realistic for your context.

items.title: Primary regions
items.description: EU, UK and UAE are the main focus points. Examples and structures are written with these regulatory and practical realities in mind.

items.title: Currencies & tokens
items.description: Inside the interface you can work with EUR, GBP, USD and SR. Some products can be unlocked via tokens, others via direct payments. Tokens are an internal balance, not an investment product.

items.title: Languages
items.description: The initial focus is on English and Arabic, so that learners in EU, UK and UAE can work in a language that feels natural.

principles.title: Principles that shape Avenqor.
principles.subtitle: These principles are intentionally conservative. The goal is to keep education grounded and avoid the usual high-risk marketing patterns.

items.title: Education only
items.description: No signals, no trade copying, no managed accounts. Courses and AI plans are there to help you think in structures, not to make decisions for you.

items.title: Respect for risk
items.description: High-risk instruments deserve conservative language. We repeatedly highlight the possibility of substantial or total loss of capital.

items.title: Process over results
items.description: We emphasise routines, journaling and rule-following. Performance is a by-product of good process, not the starting promise.

items.title: Long-term lens
items.description: Courses and AI outputs are built to be re-read and reviewed over months, not consumed once and forgotten.

neverDoes.title: What Avenqor never does.
neverDoes.subtitle: Important boundaries for how the platform operates.
items: Does not provide trading signals or "copy this now" alerts.
Does not manage trading accounts or client funds.
Does not run PAMM/MAM or copy-trading programs.
Does not guarantee any outcome, payout, win rate or return.
Does not market courses as a stable income source.
Does not position AI strategies as automatic profit-generating systems.

cta.title: Continue with structured education, not signals.
cta.subtitle: Pick a ready-made course, request a custom PDF or experiment with an AI strategy – always with the understanding that markets are high risk and outcomes are never guaranteed.
